title: Thiruonam | Teachers' Day | Nabi Day
description: Celebrate Thiruonam (Onam main day), Teachers' Day, and Eid Milad-un-Nabi together.
captions:
🌸 September 5th brings a triple celebration!

🌼 Thiruonam: The heart of Onam festivities, symbolizing prosperity and togetherness.
📚 Teachers' Day: Honoring the guiding lights of our lives.
🕌 Nabi Day (Eid Milad-un-Nabi): Remembering the teachings of Prophet Muhammad.

✨ A day of gratitude, devotion, and celebration!
aim: Capture diverse cultural, educational, and spiritual sentiments on a single day
benefit: Maximize engagement by resonating with multiple communities

title: Sree Narayana Guru Jayanthi
description: Commemorate the birth anniversary of Sree Narayana Guru, spiritual leader and social reformer.
captions:
🌿 'One caste, one religion, one God for humankind.'

On this day, we honor **Sree Narayana Guru Jayanthi**, remembering his teachings of equality, peace, and social reform.

🌟 A guiding light for unity and harmony.
benefit: Connect with Kerala and social reform-oriented audiences

title: Sree Krishna Jayanthi & Hindi Diwas
description: Celebrate the birth of Lord Krishna and the recognition of Hindi language.
captions:
🎉 Double joy on September 14!

👶🏼 **Sree Krishna Jayanthi**: Celebrating the birth of Lord Krishna with devotion, bhajans, and cultural festivities.
📝 **Hindi Diwas**: Honoring Hindi as the language that unites millions across India.

🌟 A day of devotion and cultural pride.
aim: Blend religious devotion with linguistic pride
benefit: Reach diverse audiences through cultural and linguistic connection

title: Navratri Begins
description: Kickstart the nine nights of devotion, dance, and divine energy.
captions:
🙏✨ Navratri begins!

Nine nights of devotion, garba, and vibrant traditions start today.
🌼 Let's welcome the divine feminine energy and celebrate culture, colors, and community.

#Navratri2025 #FestivalOfColors
aim: Celebrate the start of Navratri with cultural resonance

title: Durga Puja Celebrations
description: Highlight the grandeur and joy of Durga Puja across India.
captions:
🌺 Durga Puja is here!

From vibrant pandals to dhak beats and cultural gatherings, the air fills with devotion and celebration.

🌟 A festival that blends spirituality, art, and tradition.

#DurgaPuja2025 #FestiveIndia
aim: Celebrate the cultural extravaganza of Durga Puja
benefit: Engage audiences with one of India’s largest festivals

title: Durga Ashtami Pooja
description: Celebrate the sacred day of Ashtami during Navratri and Durga Puja.
captions:
🌸 **Durga Ashtami** — one of the most sacred days of Navratri & Durga Puja.

🌼 Devotees perform special rituals and prayers, celebrating the victory of good over evil.

✨ A day of devotion, power, and blessings.
benefit: Strengthen festive engagement with culturally rooted content
